comments.author: taufik123
comments.created_time: March 01, 2023, 11:39:08 PMLast edit: April 05, 2023, 12:30:45 AM by taufik123
comments.body: "Roobet Casino Tables with Mini Slot Machine"Material: WoodTools: Special tools for wood carvingType: Relief Carving + Mini Slot MachineSize: 40x45 cmDuration: 25 dayFinally the work for Snoop Dogg X Roobet is finished. It took a long time to work on the wood carving this time, because it had to use the theme "Snoop Dogg X Roobet" It took a week to get the concept of this work. There is something unique about the work I made for the current Robeet Art Contest. I embedded a Mini Slot Machine in the middle of the carving with a custom sticker that I decal myself. Besides being able to enjoy this carving work visually, we can also turn the handlebar of the mini Slot Machine to start the game. And the most difficult thing in making this work is carving Snoop Dogg's face on wood, maybe it won't be similar to the original, but I tried to sculpt it according to the image I had used. Coupled with additional colors that make the carving more alive.Â regardstaufik123 Added a Mini Slot Machine Special Custom Â "SnoopDogg x Roobet" in the middle of the Engraving.How to playhttps://i.postimg.cc/NLhyLsXb/snoopdoggxroobet1.gifFull Album Carving Processhttps://postimg.cc/gallery/y0x3kkZ/10185864Roobet Username: taufik123bech32 BTC address: bc1qcqf82ys3afxx04ga89rgew7hhn75e0hz6cnxcu

comments.body: Deadline: April 5th, so a bit more than a month to go!Also, please include your btc address with your post as payments will be sent directly to your wallet (bech32 BTC) and not to your Roobet accounts.
